title: Electric Transcendant Corrupt Cheerleader

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Cheerlead someone each day. The next night, you may choose to also short circuit them, and, once per game, you may commute them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.

desc:
Post 3233
*It makes more sense the less you think about it.*
